org.activebpel.rt.bpel.ext.expr.def.javascript
Class AeJavaScriptParseUtil

java.lang.Object
  org.activebpel.rt.bpel.ext.expr.def.javascript.AeJavaScriptParseUtil
public class AeJavaScriptParseUtil
extends java.lang.Object

A helper class that contains some static methods for parsing JavaScript expressions.

AeJavaScriptParseUtil

public AeJavaScriptParseUtil()
Method Detail

extractFunction

public static AeScriptFuncDef extractFunction(IAeNamespaceContext aNamespaceContext,
                                              org.mozilla.javascript.Node aNode)
Extracts a single function def object from the given node. The node is assumed to be of type CALL. The name of the function is extracted from the first child. The arguments are not extracted, that will be done later by the extractArgsIntoFunction method.

Parameters:
aNode -

extractName

public static javax.xml.namespace.QName extractName(org.mozilla.javascript.Node aGetPropNode)
Extracts a function name given the GETPROP node. This node will always have two children. The first will be either a NAME or it will be another GETPROP node. For example, a JavaScript call of the form myVar.funcName() (when parsed) will look like:
 GETPROP
   |--> NAME('myVar')
   |--> STRING('funcName')

However, a JavaScript call of the form myVar.bean.obj.funcName() will look like:
 GETPROP
   |--> GETPROP
          |--> GETPROP
                 |--> NAME('myVar')
                 |--> STRING('bean')
          |--> STRING('obj')
   |--> STRING('funcName')

Parameters:
aGetPropNode -

extractArgsIntoFunction

public static void extractArgsIntoFunction(org.mozilla.javascript.Node aNode,
                                           AeScriptFuncDef aFuncDef)
Extracts the argument nodes from the given node and adds them as arguments to the function def object. The Node that is passed in will have at least one node (the name of the function call). Any addition children of the node will be arguments to the call.

Parameters:
aNode - mozilla javascript node
aFuncDef -
